Description: Nagoya, Japan-based Tokai Rika Co. Ltd., agreed to plead guilty and to pay a $17.7 million criminal fine for its role in a conspiracy to fix prices of heater control panels installed in cars sold in the United States and elsewhere. Tokai Rika also agreed to plead guilty to a charge of obstruction of justice related to the investigation of the antitrust violation.

NAICS Translation: 336399: All Other Motor Vehicle Parts Manufacturing
